verses.text_uthmani: صٓ ۚ وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ذِى ٱلذِّكْرِ

translations.text: Ṣãd. By the Quran, full of reminders!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Sad walqur-ani theeaththikr
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِى عِزَّةٍ وَشِقَاقٍ

translations.text: ˹This is the truth,˺ yet the disbelievers are ˹entrenched˺ in arrogance and opposition.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Bali allatheena kafaroo fee AAizzatinwashiqaq
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن قَرْنٍ فَنَادَوا۟ وَّلَاتَ حِينَ مَنَاصٍ

translations.text: ˹Imagine˺ how many peoples We destroyed before them, and they cried out when it was too late to escape.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kam ahlakna min qablihim min qarninfanadaw walata heena manas
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَعَجِبُوٓا۟ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٌ مِّنْهُمْ ۖ وَقَالَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا سَـٰحِرٌ كَذَّابٌ

translations.text: Now, the pagans are astonished that a warner has come to them from among themselves.<sup foot_note=77265>1</sup> And the disbelievers say, “This is a magician, a total liar!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WaAAajiboo an jaahum munthirunminhum waqala alkafiroona hatha sahirunkaththab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَجَعَلَ ٱلْـَٔالِهَةَ إِلَـٰهًا وَٰحِدًا ۖ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَشَىْءٌ عُجَابٌ

translations.text: Has he reduced ˹all˺ the gods to One God? Indeed, this is something totally astonishing.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: AjaAAala al-alihata ilahan wahidaninna hatha lashay-on AAujab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱنطَلَقَ ٱلْمَلَأُ مِنْهُمْ أَنِ ٱمْشُوا۟ وَٱصْبِرُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِكُمْ ۖ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَشَىْءٌ يُرَادُ

translations.text: The chiefs among them went forth saying, “Carry on, and stand firm in devotion to your gods. Certainly this is just a scheme ˹for power˺.<sup foot_note=77266>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wantalaqa almalao minhum aniimshoo wasbiroo AAala alihatikuminna hatha lashay-on yurad
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مَا سَمِعْنَا بِهَـٰذَا فِى ٱلْمِلَّةِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا ٱخْتِلَـٰقٌ

translations.text: We have never heard of this in the previous faith.<sup foot_note=77267>1</sup> This is nothing but a fabrication.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ma samiAAna bihatha feealmillati al-akhirati in hatha illa ikhtilaq
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَءُنزِلَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلذِّكْرُ مِنۢ بَيْنِنَا ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِى شَكٍّ مِّن ذِكْرِى ۖ بَل لَّمَّا يَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِ

translations.text: Has the Reminder been revealed ˹only˺ to him out of ˹all of˺ us?” In fact, they are ˹only˺ in doubt of My ˹revealed˺ Reminder.<sup foot_note=77268>1</sup> In fact, ˹they do so because˺ they have not yet tasted My punishment.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Aonzila AAalayhi aththikru minbaynina bal hum fee shakkin min thikree bal lammayathooqoo AAathab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَآئِنُ رَحْمَةِ رَبِّكَ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْوَهَّابِ

translations.text: Or ˹is it because˺ they possess the treasuries of the mercy of your Lord—the Almighty, the Giver ˹of all bounties˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am AAindahum khaza-inu rahmatirabbika alAAazeezi alwahhab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ لَهُم مُّلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ فَلْيَرْتَقُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَسْبَـٰبِ

translations.text: Or ˹is it because˺ the kingdom of the heavens and the earth and everything in between belongs to them? Let them then climb their way ˹to heaven, if their claim is true˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am lahum mulku assamawatiwal-ardi wama baynahuma falyartaqoofee al-asbab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: جُندٌ مَّا هُنَالِكَ مَهْزُومٌ مِّنَ ٱلْأَحْزَابِ

translations.text: This is just another ˹enemy˺ force bound for defeat out there.<sup foot_note=77269>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Jundun ma hunalika mahzoomunmina al-ahzab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ ذُو ٱلْأَوْتَادِ

translations.text: Before them, the people of Noah denied ˹the truth˺, as did ’Âd, Pharaoh of the mighty structures,<sup foot_note=77270>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kaththabat qablahum qawmu noohinwaAAadun wafirAAawnu thoo al-awtad
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَثَمُودُ وَقَوْمُ لُوطٍ وَأَصْحَـٰبُ لْـَٔيْكَةِ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلْأَحْزَابُ

translations.text: Thamûd, the people of Lot, and the residents of the Forest.<sup foot_note=77271>1</sup> These were ˹all˺ enemy forces.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wathamoodu waqawmu lootin waas-habual-aykati ola-ika al-ahzab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِن كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ

translations.text: Each rejected their messenger, so My punishment was justified.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: In kullun illa kaththaba arrusulafahaqqa AAiqab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا يَنظُرُ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً مَّا لَهَا مِن فَوَاقٍ

translations.text: These ˹pagans˺ are awaiting nothing but a single Blast that cannot be stopped.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama yanthuru haola-iilla sayhatan wahidatan ma lahamin fawaq
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا عَجِّل لَّنَا قِطَّنَا قَبْلَ يَوْمِ ٱلْحِسَابِ

translations.text: They say ˹mockingly˺, “Our Lord! Hasten for us our share ˹of the punishment˺ before the Day of Reckoning.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqaloo rabbana AAajjil lanaqittana qabla yawmi alhisab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَا دَاوُۥدَ ذَا ٱلْأَيْدِ ۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ

translations.text: Be patient ˹O Prophet˺ with what they say. And remember Our servant, David, the man of strength. Indeed, he ˹constantly˺ turned ˹to Allah˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Isbir AAala mayaqooloona wathkur AAabdana dawooda thaal-aydi innahu awwab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا سَخَّرْنَا ٱلْجِبَالَ مَعَهُۥ يُسَبِّحْنَ بِٱلْعَشِىِّ وَٱلْإِشْرَاقِ

translations.text: We truly subjected the mountains to hymn ˹Our praises˺ along with him in the evening and after sunrise.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna sakhkharna aljibalamaAAahu yusabbihna bilAAashiyyi wal-ishraq
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلطَّيْرَ مَحْشُورَةً ۖ كُلٌّ لَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ

translations.text: And ˹We subjected˺ the birds, flocking together. All turned to him ˹echoing his hymns˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wattayra mahshooratankullun lahu awwab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَشَدَدْنَا مُلْكَهُۥ وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلْحِكْمَةَ وَفَصْلَ ٱلْخِطَابِ

translations.text: We strengthened his kingship, and gave him wisdom and sound judgment.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Washadadna mulkahu waataynahualhikmata wafasla alkhitab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ وَهَلْ أَتَىٰكَ نَبَؤُا۟ ٱلْخَصْمِ إِذْ تَسَوَّرُوا۟ ٱلْمِحْرَابَ

translations.text: Has the story of the two plaintiffs, who scaled the ˹wall of David’s˺ sanctuary, reached you ˹O Prophet˺?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wahal ataka nabao alkhasmi ithtasawwaroo almihrab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِذْ دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَىٰ دَاوُۥدَ فَفَزِعَ مِنْهُمْ ۖ قَالُوا۟ لَا تَخَفْ ۖ خَصْمَانِ بَغَىٰ بَعْضُنَا عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ فَٱحْكُم بَيْنَنَا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا تُشْطِطْ وَٱهْدِنَآ إِلَىٰ سَوَآءِ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ

translations.text: When they came into David’s presence, he was startled by them. They said, “Have no fear. ˹We are merely˺ two in a dispute: one of us has wronged the other. So judge between us with truth—do not go beyond ˹it˺—and guide us to the right way.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ith dakhaloo AAala dawoodafafaziAAa minhum qaloo la takhaf khasmanibagha baAAduna AAala baAAdinfahkum baynana bilhaqqi walatushtit wahdina ila sawa-iassirat
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ هَـٰذَآ أَخِى لَهُۥ تِسْعٌ وَتِسْعُونَ نَعْجَةً وَلِىَ نَعْجَةٌ وَٰحِدَةٌ فَقَالَ أَكْفِلْنِيهَا وَعَزَّنِى فِى ٱلْخِطَابِ

translations.text: This is my brother.<sup foot_note=77272>1</sup> He has ninety-nine sheep while I have ˹only˺ one. ˹Still˺ he asked me to give it up to him, overwhelming me with ˹his˺ argument.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna hatha akhee lahu tisAAunwatisAAoona naAAjatan waliya naAAjatun wahidatun faqalaakfilneeha waAAazzanee fee alkhitab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ لَقَدْ ظَلَمَكَ بِسُؤَالِ نَعْجَتِكَ إِلَىٰ نِعَاجِهِۦ ۖ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرًا مِّنَ ٱلْخُلَطَآءِ لَيَبْغِى بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَقَلِيلٌ مَّا هُمْ ۗ وَظَنَّ دَاوُۥدُ أَنَّمَا فَتَنَّـٰهُ فَٱسْتَغْفَرَ رَبَّهُۥ وَخَرَّ رَاكِعًا وَأَنَابَ ۩

translations.text: David ˹eventually˺ ruled, “He has definitely wronged you in demanding ˹to add˺ your sheep to his. And certainly many partners wrong each other, except those who believe and do good—but how few are they!” Then David realized that We had tested him so he asked for his Lord’s forgiveness, fell down in prostration, and turned ˹to Him in repentance˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala laqad thalamakabisu-ali naAAjatika ila niAAajihi wa-innakatheeran mina alkhulata-i layabghee baAAduhum AAalabaAAdin illa allatheena amanoowaAAamiloo assalihati waqaleelun mahum wathanna dawoodu annama fatannahufastaghfara rabbahu wakharra rakiAAan waanab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَغَفَرْنَا لَهُۥ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍ

translations.text: So We forgave that for him. And he will indeed have ˹a status of˺ closeness to Us and an honourable destination!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faghafarna lahu thalikawa-inna lahu AAindana lazulfa wahusna maab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَـٰدَاوُۥدُ إِنَّا جَعَلْنَـٰكَ خَلِيفَةً فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱحْكُم بَيْنَ ٱلنَّاسِ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا تَتَّبِعِ ٱلْهَوَىٰ فَيُضِلَّكَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَضِلُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌۢ بِمَا نَسُوا۟ يَوْمَ ٱلْحِسَابِ

translation.text: for it will lead you astray

translations.text: ˹We instructed him:˺ “O David! We have surely made you an authority in the land, so judge between people with truth. And do not follow ˹your˺ desires or they will lead you astray from Allah’s Way. Surely those who go astray from Allah’s Way will suffer a severe punishment for neglecting the Day of Reckoning.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ya dawoodu inna jaAAalnakakhaleefatan fee al-ardi fahkum bayna annasibilhaqqi wala tattabiAAi alhawa fayudillakaAAan sabeeli Allahi inna allatheena yadilloonaAAan sabeeli Allahi lahum AAathabun shadeedun bimanasoo yawma alhisab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا بَـٰطِلًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ظَنُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ۚ فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِ

translations.text: We have not created the heavens and earth and everything in between without purpose—as the disbelievers think. So woe to the disbelievers because of the Fire!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama khalaqna assamaawal-arda wama baynahuma batilanthalika thannu allatheena kafaroofawaylun lillatheena kafaroo mina annar
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ نَجْعَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ كَٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَمْ نَجْعَلُ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ كَٱلْفُجَّارِ

translations.text: Or should We treat those who believe and do good like those who make mischief throughout the land? Or should We treat the righteous like the wicked?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am najAAalu allatheena amanoowaAAamiloo assalihati kalmufsideenafee al-ardi am najAAalu almuttaqeena kalfujjar
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كِتَـٰبٌ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ إِلَيْكَ مُبَـٰرَكٌ لِّيَدَّبَّرُوٓا۟ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ وَلِيَتَذَكَّرَ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ

translations.text: ˹This is˺ a blessed Book which We have revealed to you ˹O Prophet˺ so that they may contemplate its verses, and people of reason may be mindful.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kitabun anzalnahu ilayka mubarakunliyaddabbaroo ayatihi waliyatathakkara olooal-albab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَوَهَبْنَا لِدَاوُۥدَ سُلَيْمَـٰنَ ۚ نِعْمَ ٱلْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ

translations.text: And We blessed David with Solomon—what an excellent servant ˹he was˺! Indeed, he ˹constantly˺ turned ˹to Allah˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wawahabna lidawooda sulaymananiAAma alAAabdu innahu awwab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِذْ عُرِضَ عَلَيْهِ بِٱلْعَشِىِّ ٱلصَّـٰفِنَـٰتُ ٱلْجِيَادُ

translations.text: ˹Remember˺ when the well-trained, swift horses were paraded before him in the evening.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ith AAurida AAalayhi bilAAashiyyiassafinatu aljiyad
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَقَالَ إِنِّىٓ أَحْبَبْتُ حُبَّ ٱلْخَيْرِ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّى حَتَّىٰ تَوَارَتْ بِٱلْحِجَابِ

translations.text: He then proclaimed, “I am truly in love with ˹these˺ fine things out of remembrance for my Lord,” until they went out of sight.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faqala innee ahbabtu hubbaalkhayri AAan thikri rabbee hatta tawaratbilhijab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: رُدُّوهَا عَلَىَّ ۖ فَطَفِقَ مَسْحًۢا بِٱلسُّوقِ وَٱلْأَعْنَاقِ

translations.text: ˹He ordered,˺ “Bring them back to me!” Then he began to rub down their legs and necks.<sup foot_note=77273>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ruddooha AAalayya fatafiqa mashanbissooqi wal-aAAnaq
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا سُلَيْمَـٰنَ وَأَلْقَيْنَا عَلَىٰ كُرْسِيِّهِۦ جَسَدًا ثُمَّ أَنَابَ

translations.text: And indeed, We tested Solomon, placing a ˹deformed˺ body on his throne,<sup foot_note=77274>1</sup> then he turned ˹to Allah in repentance˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad fatanna sulaymanawaalqayna AAala kursiyyihi jasadan thumma anab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱغْفِرْ لِى وَهَبْ لِى مُلْكًا لَّا يَنۢبَغِى لِأَحَدٍ مِّنۢ بَعْدِىٓ ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْوَهَّابُ

translations.text: He prayed, “My Lord! Forgive me, and grant me an authority that will never be matched by anyone after me. You are indeed the Giver ˹of all bounties˺.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala rabbi ighfir lee wahab leemulkan la yanbaghee li-ahadin min baAAdee innakaanta alwahhab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَسَخَّرْنَا لَهُ ٱلرِّيحَ تَجْرِى بِأَمْرِهِۦ رُخَآءً حَيْثُ أَصَابَ

translations.text: So We subjected to him the wind, blowing gently at his command to wherever he pleased.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fasakhkharna lahu arreehatajree bi-amrihi rukhaan haythu asab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ كُلَّ بَنَّآءٍ وَغَوَّاصٍ

translations.text: And ˹We subjected to him˺ every builder and diver<sup foot_note=77275>1</sup> of the jinn,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Washshayateena kulla banna-inwaghawwas
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَءَاخَرِينَ مُقَرَّنِينَ فِى ٱلْأَصْفَادِ

translations.text: and others bound together in chains.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waakhareena muqarraneena fee al-asfad
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: هَـٰذَا عَطَآؤُنَا فَٱمْنُنْ أَوْ أَمْسِكْ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ

translations.text: ˹Allah said,˺ “This is Our gift, so give or withhold ˹as you wish˺, never to be called to account.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hatha AAataona famnunaw amsik bighayri hisab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍ

translations.text: And he will indeed have ˹a status of˺ closeness to Us and an honourable destination!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-inna lahu AAindana lazulfawahusna maab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَآ أَيُّوبَ إِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّى مَسَّنِىَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ بِنُصْبٍ وَعَذَابٍ

translations.text: And remember Our servant Job, when he cried out to his Lord, “Satan has afflicted me with distress and suffering.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wathkur AAabdanaayyooba ith nada rabbahu annee massaniya ashshaytanubinusbin waAAathab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱرْكُضْ بِرِجْلِكَ ۖ هَـٰذَا مُغْتَسَلٌۢ بَارِدٌ وَشَرَابٌ

translation.text: (is a spring of) water to bathe

translations.text: ˹We responded,˺ “Stomp your foot: ˹now˺ here is a cool ˹and refreshing˺ spring for washing and drinking.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Orkud birijlika hathamughtasalun baridun washarab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُۥٓ أَهْلَهُۥ وَمِثْلَهُم مَّعَهُمْ رَحْمَةً مِّنَّا وَذِكْرَىٰ لِأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ

translations.text: And We gave him back his family, twice as many, as a mercy from Us and a lesson for people of reason.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wawahabna lahu ahlahu wamithlahummaAAahum rahmatan minna wathikrali-olee al-albab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَخُذْ بِيَدِكَ ضِغْثًا فَٱضْرِب بِّهِۦ وَلَا تَحْنَثْ ۗ إِنَّا وَجَدْنَـٰهُ صَابِرًا ۚ نِّعْمَ ٱلْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ

translations.text: ˹And We said to him,˺ “Take in your hand a bundle of grass, and strike ˹your wife˺ with it, and do not break your oath.”<sup foot_note=77276>1</sup> We truly found him patient. What an excellent servant ˹he was˺! Indeed, he ˹constantly˺ turned ˹to Allah˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wakhuth biyadika dighthan fadribbihi wala tahnath inna wajadnahu sabiranniAAma alAAabdu innahu awwab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱذْكُرْ عِبَـٰدَنَآ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسْحَـٰقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ أُو۟لِى ٱلْأَيْدِى وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرِ

translations.text: And remember Our servants: Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob—the men of strength and insight.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wathkur AAibadanaibraheema wa-ishaqa wayaAAqooba olee al-aydee wal-absar
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّآ أَخْلَصْنَـٰهُم بِخَالِصَةٍ ذِكْرَى ٱلدَّارِ

translations.text: We truly chose them for the honour of proclaiming the Hereafter.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna akhlasnahum bikhalisatinthikra addar
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّهُمْ عِندَنَا لَمِنَ ٱلْمُصْطَفَيْنَ ٱلْأَخْيَارِ

translations.text: And in Our sight they are truly among the chosen and the finest.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-innahum AAindana lamina almustafaynaal-akhyar
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱذْكُرْ إِسْمَـٰعِيلَ وَٱلْيَسَعَ وَذَا ٱلْكِفْلِ ۖ وَكُلٌّ مِّنَ ٱلْأَخْيَارِ

translations.text: Also remember Ishmael, Elisha, and Ⱬul-Kifl.<sup foot_note=77277>1</sup> All are among the best.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wathkur ismaAAeelawa-ilyasaAAa watha alkifli wakullun mina al-akhyar
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: هَـٰذَا ذِكْرٌ ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍ

translations.text: This is ˹all˺ a reminder. And the righteous will certainly have an honourable destination:
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hatha thikrun wa-innalilmuttaqeena lahusna maab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: جَنَّـٰتِ عَدْنٍ مُّفَتَّحَةً لَّهُمُ ٱلْأَبْوَٰبُ

translations.text: the Gardens of Eternity, whose gates will be open for them.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Jannati AAadnin mufattahatanlahumu al-abwab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا يَدْعُونَ فِيهَا بِفَـٰكِهَةٍ كَثِيرَةٍ وَشَرَابٍ

translations.text: There they will recline, calling for abundant fruit and drink.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Muttaki-eena feeha yadAAoona feehabifakihatin katheeratin washarab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ وَعِندَهُمْ قَـٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرْفِ أَتْرَابٌ

translations.text: And with them will be maidens of modest gaze and equal age.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WaAAindahum qasiratu attarfiatrab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: هَـٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِيَوْمِ ٱلْحِسَابِ

translations.text: This is what you are promised for the Day of Reckoning.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hatha ma tooAAadoona liyawmialhisab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَرِزْقُنَا مَا لَهُۥ مِن نَّفَادٍ

translations.text: This is indeed Our provision that will never end.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna hatha larizquna malahu min nafad
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: هَـٰذَا ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلطَّـٰغِينَ لَشَرَّ مَـَٔابٍ

translations.text: That is that. And the transgressors will certainly have the worst destination:
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hatha wa-inna littagheenalasharra maab
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: جَهَنَّمَ يَصْلَوْنَهَا فَبِئْسَ ٱلْمِهَادُ

translations.text: Hell, where they will burn. What an evil place to rest!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Jahannama yaslawnaha fabi/saalmihad
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: هَـٰذَا فَلْيَذُوقُوهُ حَمِيمٌ وَغَسَّاقٌ

translations.text: Let them then taste this: boiling water and ˹oozing˺ pus,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hatha falyathooqoohu hameemunwaghassaq
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَءَاخَرُ مِن شَكْلِهِۦٓ أَزْوَٰجٌ

translations.text: and other torments of the same sort!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waakharu min shaklihi azwaj
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: هَـٰذَا فَوْجٌ مُّقْتَحِمٌ مَّعَكُمْ ۖ لَا مَرْحَبًۢا بِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ صَالُوا۟ ٱلنَّارِ

translations.text: ˹The misleaders will say to one another,˺ “Here is a crowd ˹of followers˺ being thrown in with us. They are not welcome, ˹for˺ they ˹too˺ will burn in the Fire.”<sup foot_note=77278>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hatha fawjun muqtahimunmaAAakum la marhaban bihim innahum saloo annar
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ بَلْ أَنتُمْ لَا مَرْحَبًۢا بِكُمْ ۖ أَنتُمْ قَدَّمْتُمُوهُ لَنَا ۖ فَبِئْسَ ٱلْقَرَارُ

translations.text: The followers will respond, “No! You are not welcome! You brought this upon us. What an evil place for settlement!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo bal antum la marhabanbikum antum qaddamtumoohu lana fabi/sa alqarar
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا مَن قَدَّمَ لَنَا هَـٰذَا فَزِدْهُ عَذَابًا ضِعْفًا فِى ٱلنَّارِ

translations.text: Adding, “Our Lord! Whoever brought this upon us, double their punishment in the Fire.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo rabbana man qaddama lanahatha fazidhu AAathaban diAAfan fee annar
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالُوا۟ مَا لَنَا لَا نَرَىٰ رِجَالًا كُنَّا نَعُدُّهُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَشْرَارِ

translations.text: The tyrants will ask ˹one another˺, “But why do we not see those we considered to be lowly?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqaloo ma lana lanara rijalan kunna naAAudduhum mina al-ashrar
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَتَّخَذْنَـٰهُمْ سِخْرِيًّا أَمْ زَاغَتْ عَنْهُمُ ٱلْأَبْصَـٰرُ

translations.text: Were we wrong in mocking them ˹in the world˺?<sup foot_note=77279>1</sup> Or do our eyes ˹just˺ fail to see them ˹in the Fire˺?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Attakhathnahum sikhriyyan am zaghatAAanhumu al-absar
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَحَقٌّ تَخَاصُمُ أَهْلِ ٱلنَّارِ

translations.text: This dispute between the residents of the Fire will certainly come to pass.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna thalika lahaqqun takhasumuahli annar
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ مُنذِرٌ ۖ وَمَا مِنْ إِلَـٰهٍ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ ٱلْوَٰحِدُ ٱلْقَهَّارُ

translations.text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I am only a warner. And there is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Allah—the One, the Supreme.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul innama ana munthirunwama min ilahin illa Allahu alwahidualqahhar
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْغَفَّـٰرُ

translations.text: ˹He is the˺ Lord of the heavens and the earth and everything in between—the Almighty, Most Forgiving.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Rabbu assamawati wal-ardiwama baynahuma alAAazeezu alghaffar
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ هُوَ نَبَؤٌا۟ عَظِيمٌ

translations.text: Say, “This ˹Quran˺ is momentous news,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul huwa nabaon AAatheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَنتُمْ عَنْهُ مُعْرِضُونَ

translations.text: from which you ˹pagans˺ are turning away.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Antum AAanhu muAAridoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مَا كَانَ لِىَ مِنْ عِلْمٍۭ بِٱلْمَلَإِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰٓ إِذْ يَخْتَصِمُونَ

translations.text: ˹And say,˺ “I had no knowledge of the highest assembly ˹in heaven˺ when they differed ˹concerning Adam˺.<sup foot_note=77280>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ma kana liya min AAilmin bilmala-ial-aAAla ith yakhtasimoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِن يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَىَّ إِلَّآ أَنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ

translations.text: What is revealed to me is that I am only sent with a clear warning.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: In yooha ilayya illa annamaana natheerun mubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّى خَـٰلِقٌۢ بَشَرًا مِّن طِينٍ

translations.text: ˹Remember, O  Prophet˺ when your Lord said to the angels, “I am going to create a human being from clay.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ith qala rabbuka lilmala-ikatiinnee khaliqun basharan min teen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَإِذَا سَوَّيْتُهُۥ وَنَفَخْتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِى فَقَعُوا۟ لَهُۥ سَـٰجِدِينَ

translations.text: So when I have fashioned him and had a spirit of My Own ˹creation˺ breathed into him, fall down in prostration to him.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fa-itha sawwaytuhu wanafakhtu feehimin roohee faqaAAoo lahu sajideen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَسَجَدَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ كُلُّهُمْ أَجْمَعُونَ

translations.text: So the angels prostrated all together—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fasajada almala-ikatu kulluhumajmaAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّآ إِبْلِيسَ ٱسْتَكْبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ

translations.text: but not Iblîs,<sup foot_note=77281>1</sup> who acted arrogantly,<sup foot_note=77282>2</sup> becoming unfaithful.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa ibleesa istakbara wakanamina alkafireen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ يَـٰٓإِبْلِيسُ مَا مَنَعَكَ أَن تَسْجُدَ لِمَا خَلَقْتُ بِيَدَىَّ ۖ أَسْتَكْبَرْتَ أَمْ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلْعَالِينَ

translations.text: Allah asked, “O Iblîs! What prevented you from prostrating to what I created with My Own Hands? Did you ˹just˺ become proud? Or have you always been arrogant?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala ya ibleesu mamanaAAaka an tasjuda lima khalaqtu biyadayya astakbarta amkunta mina alAAaleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ أَنَا۠ خَيْرٌ مِّنْهُ ۖ خَلَقْتَنِى مِن نَّارٍ وَخَلَقْتَهُۥ مِن طِينٍ

translations.text: He replied, “I am better than he is: You created me from fire and him from clay.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala ana khayrun minhukhalaqtanee min narin wakhalaqtahu min teen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ فَٱخْرُجْ مِنْهَا فَإِنَّكَ رَجِيمٌ

translations.text: Allah commanded, “Then get out of Paradise, for you are truly cursed.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala fakhruj minhafa-innaka rajeem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكَ لَعْنَتِىٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ

translations.text: And surely upon you is My condemnation until the Day of Judgment.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-inna AAalayka laAAnatee ila yawmiaddeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرْنِىٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ

translations.text: Satan appealed, “My Lord! Then delay my end until the Day of their resurrection.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala rabbi faanthirneeila yawmi yubAAathoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ فَإِنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُنظَرِينَ

translations.text: Allah said, “You will be delayed
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala fa-innaka mina almunthareen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْوَقْتِ ٱلْمَعْلُومِ

translations.text: until the appointed Day.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ila yawmi alwaqti almaAAloom
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ فَبِعِزَّتِكَ لَأُغْوِيَنَّهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ

translations.text: Satan said, “By Your Glory! I will certainly mislead them all,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala fabiAAizzatika laoghwiyannahumajmaAAeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّا عِبَادَكَ مِنْهُمُ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ

translations.text: except Your chosen servants among them.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa AAibadaka minhumualmukhlaseen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ فَٱلْحَقُّ وَٱلْحَقَّ أَقُولُ

translations.text: Allah concluded, “The truth is—and I ˹only˺ say the truth—:
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala falhaqqu walhaqqaaqool
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَأَمْلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنكَ وَمِمَّن تَبِعَكَ مِنْهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ

translations.text: I will surely fill up Hell with you and whoever follows you from among them, all together.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Laamlaanna jahannama minka wamimmantabiAAaka minhum ajmaAAeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ مَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلْمُتَكَلِّفِينَ

translations.text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I do not ask you for any reward for this ˹Quran˺, nor do I pretend to be someone I am not.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul ma as-alukum AAalayhi min ajrinwama ana mina almutakallifeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

translations.text: It is only a reminder to the whole world.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: In huwa illa thikrun lilAAalameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَتَعْلَمُنَّ نَبَأَهُۥ بَعْدَ حِينٍۭ

translations.text: And you will certainly know its truth before long.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WalataAAlamunna nabaahu baAAda heen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
